`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"html","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<body>
  <form action="post">
    <p><span>\u7528\u6237\u540D\uFF1A</span><input type="text" id="username" /></p>
    <!--\u591A\u9009\u6846\u7684\u503C\u5C31\u662F\u5B9A\u4E49\u597D\u7684value-->
    <p>
      <span>\u6027\u522B\uFF1A</span>
      <input type="radio" name="sex" value="man" id="boy" />\u7537
      <input type="radio" name="sex" value="woman" id="girl" />\u5973
    </p>
  </form>
  <script>
    var input_text = document.getElementById("username");
    var boy_radio = document.getElementById("boy");
    var girl_radio = document.getElementById("girl");
    //\u5F97\u5230\u8F93\u5165\u6846\u7684\u503C
    input_text.value;
    //\u4FEE\u6539\u8F93\u5165\u6846\u7684\u503C
    input_text.value = "value";

    //\u5BF9\u4E8E\u5355\u9009\u6846\uFF0C\u591A\u9009\u6846\u7B49\u7B49\u56FA\u5B9A\u7684\u503C\uFF0Cboy_radio.value\u53EA\u80FD\u53D6\u5230\u5F53\u524D\u7684\u503C
    boy_radio.checked; //\u67E5\u770B\u8FD4\u56DE\u7684\u7ED3\u679C\uFF0C\u662F\u5426\u4E3Atrue\uFF0C\u5982\u679C\u4E3Atrue\uFF0C\u5219\u88AB\u9009\u4E2D\u3002
    girl_radio.checked = true; //\u8D4B\u503C
  <\/script>
</body>

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"html","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <title>Title</title>
    <!--MD5\u52A0\u5BC6\u5DE5\u5177\u7C7B-->
    <script src="https://cdn.bootcss.com/blueimp-md5/2.10.0/js/md5.min.js"><\/script>
  </head>
  <body>
    <!--\u8868\u8FBE\u7ED1\u5B9A\u63D0\u4EA4\u4E8B\u4EF6
			\u03BFnsubmit= \u7ED1\u5B9A\u4E00\u4E2A\u63D0\u4EA4\u68C0\u6D4B\u7684\u51FD\u6570\uFF0Ctrue\uFF0Cfalse
			\u5C06\u8FD9\u4E2A\u7ED3\u679C\u8FD4\u56DE\u7ED9\u8868\u5355\uFF0C\u4F7F\u7528onsubmit\u63A5\u6536
		-->
    <form action="https://www.baidu.com" method="post" onsubmit="return aaa()">
      <p>
        <span>\u7528\u6237\u540D\uFF1A</span><input type="text" id="username" name="username" />
      </p>
      <p><span>\u5BC6\u7801\uFF1A</span><input type="password" id="password" /></p>
      <input type="hidden" id="md5-password" name="password" />

      <!--\u7ED1\u5B9A\u4E8B\u4EF6 onclick \u88AB\u70B9\u51FB-->
      <button type="submit">\u63D0\u4EA4</button>
    </form>

    <script>
      function aaa() {
        alert(1);
        var username = document.getElementById("username");
        var pwd = document.getElementById("password");
        var md5pwd = document.getElementById("md5-password");
        //pwd.value = md5(pwd,value);
        md5pwd.value = mad5(pwd.value);
        //\u53EF\u4EE5\u6821\u9A8C\u5224\u65AD\u8868\u5355\u5185\u5BB9\uFF0Ctrue\u5C31\u662F\u901A\u8FC7\u63D0\u4EA4\uFF0Cfalse\u5C31\u662F\u963B\u6B62\u63D0\u4EA4
        return false;
      }
    <\/script>
  </body>
</html>

<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <title>Title</title>
    <script src="lib/jquery-3.4.1.js"><\/script>
    <style>
      #divMove {
        width: 500px;
        height: 500px;
        border: 1px solid red;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <!--\u8981\u6C42\uFF1A\u83B7\u53D6\u9F20\u6807\u5F53\u524D\u7684\u4E00\u4E2A\u5750\u6807-->
    mouse\uFF1A<span id="mouseMove"></span>
    <div id="divMove">\u5728\u8FD9\u91CC\u79FB\u52A8\u9F20\u6807\u8BD5\u8BD5</div>
    <script>
      //\u5F53\u7F51\u9875\u5143\u7D20\u52A0\u8F7D\u5B8C\u6BD5\u4E4B\u540E\uFF0C\u54CD\u5E94\u4E8B\u4EF6
      //$(document).ready(function(){})
      $(function () {
        $("#divMove").mousemove(function (e) {
          $("#mouseMove").text("x:" + e.pageX + "y:" + e.pageY);
        });
      });
    <\/script>
  </body>
